name: Alice Mathias
bio:
Alice Mathias works for Lorne Michaelsâ€™ TV company Broadway Video where she is a Co-Executive Producer of Portlandia and a Producer of Documentary Now! Alice has written and directed various projects with collaborator Fred Armisen, including Paul Simon at the NY Auto Show and The Dominizuelan Consulate. She wrote The Portlandia Cookbook and has occasionally contributed to The New York Times.

Originally from Chicago she now splits her time between Los Angeles and Portland.
